name: Intro to Unity: Coding
description: Learn about coding with physics, coroutines, events, and more in this beginner-intermediate Unity workshop! This is the perfect followup to Intro to Unity for beginners! Hosted in general-voice on Discord.

name: EXPO Day
description: Come drop by our booth during club EXPO day in the Nechako building! Plus, check out all the other cool clubs around campus!

name: Intro to Unity
description: Learn about game objects, physics, user input and more in this Unity workshop for beginners! Watch or follow along in general-voice on Discord.

name: Pixel Art Workshop
description: In this workshop, you can learn how to make pixel art and design a simple sprite for a game! Drop by the general-voice channel in Discord and hang out with us - no artistic skill required!

name: Discord Emoji Making Event
description: This Friday we will design awesome emojis to use in the Discord server and meet all our new and returning club members! Everyone is welcome, and we will meet in general-voice on Discord. No artistic skills are required!

name: Super Summer Mashup Jam
description: A 48 hour virtual game jam focused on doing what you're good at. Categories for submission are Music, Art, Programming, Level Design, Game Design, Voice Acting.

name: Annual General Meeting
description: The Annual General Meeting is a club-wide event where we go over our many achievements in the past year, announce the new executives, as well as discuss our plans for the upcoming year!
